title: A Comprehensive Guide for Voiceover Artists
headline: Make money with your voice with this free online course that explains how to market yourself and your voiceover skills.
description: Voiceover artists are usually heard but not seen. This course teaches you how to record high-quality professional voice clips to accompany audiobooks, video games, animation, commercial adverts and radio. We explain the difference between voiceover and voice acting and the roles of voiceover performers. We then show you how to plan your demo content and provide the best techniques used to promote your voice and impress more clients.
courseDescription:
Have you ever wondered how voice actors can command the attention of a crowd for hours without losing their voice? This free online voiceover training course teaches you the skills and techniques used to motivate the audience in any recording context. We introduce you to the basics of voiceover performance and identify the qualities that define a successful voice actor. Learn how to turn your voiceover skills into a career.

The course breaks down the steps taken to understand your audience as you read and interpret scripts to make sure you deliver the copy effectively. We help you discover your unique voice and explain how to use it to create engaging and unique characters. We demonstrate how to breathe correctly to create a powerful voice and capture emotional expression. Do you ever feel like no one wants to listen to you? We cover voice training exercises designed to improve your ability to deliver quality performances. We root out bad vocal habits and speech problems and show you how to eliminate them.

We provide crucial tips for maintaining a healthy voice and explain how to set up your recording studio. We go over the steps used to set up the recording process and define relevant technical terms. Finally, we explore the UK’s voice acting industry to help you find rewarding opportunities to allow you to showcase your newfound skills. This voiceover course has no prerequisites and improves your resume and chance of establishing your professional value. Sign up to turn your voice into an asset and explore the exciting world of spoken performance.
